thread.title: Erasmo Morales
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Erasmo Morales

author: Erasmo Morales
title: Erasmo Morales
text: I got the shadow of mordor bundle for $5 I was looking into buying it for a while now and considered getting it on steam. The price was $30 for the same bundle on there so when I saw the price I was able to just hit the button and not even think about it. In seconds I got an email saying my key was ready. I confirmed it on steam and it worked! Same game and everything they recognized it as a retail copy. I'm very happy with my purchase and will continue to make orders.
